displayName.schinese: 今天出门没吃药，感觉自己萌萌哒

description.english: Loralyn did not drug her father Alecis
description.german: Du hast deinem Vater Alecis keine Beruhigungsmittel verabreicht.
description.french: Loralyn n’a pas donné de médicaments à son père Alecis
description.italian: Loralyn non ha sedato Alecis, suo padre
description.koreana: 로랄린이 아빠 알렉시스에게 약을 먹이지 않았습니다
description.spanish: Loralyn no drogó a su padre, Alecis.
description.russian: Лоралин не дает лекарства отцу Алексис
description.japanese: ロラリンが父アレシスに薬を盛らなかった
description.brazilian: Loralyn não deu os remédios para seu pai, Alecis.
description.schinese: 洛莲没有对父亲艾力西斯使用药物

description.german: Du hast deinem Vater Alecis Beruhigungsmittel verabreicht.
description.french: Loralyn a donné son médicament à son père
description.italian: Loralyn ha sedato Alecis, suo padre
description.spanish: Loralyn drogó a su padre, Alecis.
description.japanese: ロラリンが父アレシスに薬を盛った
description.schinese: 洛莲对父亲艾力西斯使用了药物

description.german: Du hast dich für das Familiengespräch entschieden.
description.italian: Loralyn ha scelto la chiamata di famiglia
description.japanese: ロラリンが家族同士の通話を受けた

description.german: Du hast dich für das Geschäftsgespräch entschieden.
description.italian: Loralyn ha scelto la chiamata di lavoro
description.spanish: Loralyn interpretó para los hombres de negocios.
description.japanese: ロラリンがビジネス関係の通話を受けた
description.brazilian: Loralyn atendeu à ligação de negócios.

description.english: Loralyn was able to save her father from the spirits
description.german: Es ist dir gelungen, deinen Vater vor den Geistern zu retten.
description.french: Loralyn a réussi à sauver son père des esprits
description.italian: Loralyn è riuscita a salvare suo padre dagli spiriti
description.spanish: Loralyn logró salvar a su padre de los espíritus.
description.russian: Лоралин удалось спасти отца от духов
description.japanese: ロラリンが精霊から父を救うことに成功した
description.brazilian: Loralyn conseguiu salvar seu pai dos Espíritos.

description.english: Theron was impressed by Loralyn and allowed her to burn the book
description.german: Thèron war beeindruckt von dir und hat dir gestattet, das Buch zu vernichten.
description.french: Thèron a été impressionné par Loralyn et l’a laissée brûler le livre
description.italian: Loralyn ha convinto Thèron, che le ha permesso di bruciare il libro
description.koreana: 로랄린을 보고 마음이 움직인 테론이 책을 불태워도 좋다고 허락했습니다
description.spanish: Thèron quedó impresionado con Loralyn y le permitió quemar el libro.
description.russian: Лоралин впечатлила Терона и он позволил ей сжечь книгу
description.japanese: テロンはロラリンに感心し、彼女が本を燃やすことを許可した
description.turkish: Theron, Loralyn'den etkilendi ve kitabı yakmasına izin verdi
description.brazilian: Theron ficou impressionado por Loralyn e permitiu que ela queimasse o livro.
description.schinese: 成功说服西伦让他愿意将书烧毁

description.english: Why not get paid a little extra when all this madness is happening around you?
description.german: Warum sollte man sich nicht einen kleinen Bonus gönnen, wenn man schon in diesen Wahnsinn gerät?
description.french: Pourquoi ne pas profiter de toute cette folie pour vous verser un petit bonus ?
description.italian: Perché non farsi pagare un piccolo extra se attorno a te regna la follia?
description.koreana: 아수라장의 한복판에서 한 푼이라도 더 벌어 보는 건 어떨까요?
description.spanish: ¿Qué hay de malo en llevarse una comisión por toda esta locura?
description.russian: Почему не получить немного больше, когда вокруг творится такое безумие?
description.japanese: 周囲で起きている狂乱に対するちょっとした手当をもらっても罰は当たるまい
description.turkish: Etrafında tüm bu çılgınlıklar yaşanırken neden biraz fazladan maaş almıyorsun ki?
description.brazilian: Com toda essa loucura acontecendo, qual o problema em receber uma grana extra?
description.schinese: 就算身陷危机，也要偷偷赚点

description.english: Use Loralyn's connections with Jacqueline to learn to burn the book
description.german: Du hast deine Verbindung zu Jacqueline genutzt, um zu erfahren, dass das Buch zu vernichten ist.
description.french: Servez-vous des relations de Loralyn pour que Jacqueline lui apprenne comment faire brûler le livre
description.italian: Usa i legami di Loralyn con Jacqueline per capire come bruciare il libro
description.koreana: 로랄린과 재클린 사이의 인맥을 활용해 책을 불태우세요
description.spanish: Loralyn usó su contacto con Jacqueline para saber que tenía que quemar el libro.
description.russian: Используйте связи Лоралин, чтобы понять, как сжечь книгу
description.japanese: ジャクリーンとロラリンの関係を利用して本の燃やし方を知る
description.turkish: Kitabın nasıl yakıldığını öğrenmek için Loralyn'in Jacqueline ile olan bağlantısını kullan
description.brazilian: Use os contatos de Loralyn com Jacqueline para aprender a queimar o livro.
description.schinese: 利用和杰奎琳的关系了解到如何焚毁书籍

description.english: Loralyn offered Max hope when he needed it
description.german: Du hast Max Hoffnung gemacht, als er das gebraucht hat.
description.french: Loralyn a offert de l’espoir à Max quand il en avait besoin
description.italian: Loralyn ha offerto una speranza a Max quando lui ne aveva bisogno
description.koreana: 로랄린이 절망에 빠진 맥스에게 희망을 불어넣었습니다
description.spanish: Loralyn le dio esperanza a Max cuando él la necesitaba.
description.russian: Лоралин далу надежду Максу, когда он в ней нуждался
description.japanese: ロラリンは、マックスに彼の欲していた希望を与える
description.turkish: Loralyn, ihtiyacı olduğunda Max'e umut verdi
description.brazilian: Loralyn deu esperanças a Max quando ele precisou.
description.schinese: 洛莲为马科斯带来了希望

description.english: Convince Max to bring Loralyn the book
description.german: Du hast Max davon überzeugt, dir das Buch zu bringen.
description.french: Convaincre Max d’apporter le livre à Loralyn
description.italian: Convinci Max a portare il libro a Loralyn
description.koreana: 맥스를 설득해 로랄린에게 책을 가져오게 하세요
description.spanish: Loralyn convenció a Max de que le llevase el libro.
description.japanese: ロラリンに本を届けるようマックスを説得する
description.turkish: Max'i, kitabı Loralyn'e getirmeye ikna et
description.brazilian: Convença Max a trazer o livro para Loralyn.
description.schinese: 说服马科斯把书带过来

description.english: Complete the sale of the Book to Theron
description.german: Du hast den Verkauf des Buches an Thèron über die Bühne gebracht.
description.french: Conclure la vente du livre à Thèron
description.italian: Completa la vendita del libro a Thèron
description.spanish: Loralyn completó la venta del libro al señor Thèron.
description.russian: Завершите сделку по продаже книги Терону
description.japanese: テロンとの本の売買を完了する
description.brazilian: Complete a venda do Livro para Theron.
description.schinese: 成功让西伦买下这本书

displayName.russian: Никто не может быть в безопасности

description.english: Witness Cody become possessed by the spirits
description.german: Du hast mitangesehen, wie Cody von den Geistern besessen wurde.
description.french: Voir Cody se faire posséder par les esprits
description.italian: Cody, la testimone, è posseduta dagli spiriti
description.spanish: Loralyn fue testigo de la posesión de Cody por los espíritus.
description.russian: Увидьте как Коди становится одержима духами
description.japanese: コーディーが精霊に取りつかれるところを目撃する
description.turkish: Cody'nin, ruhlar tarafından ele geçirilmesine tanıklık et
description.brazilian: Presencie Cody ser possuída pelos Espíritos.
description.schinese: 眼睁睁地看着蔻蒂被恶灵附身

description.english: Loralyn spoke to Pearce every chance she got.
description.german: Du hast zu jeder Gelegenheit, die sich dir geboten hat, mit Pearce gesprochen.
description.french: Loralyn a parlé à Pearce à chaque occasion qu’elle a eu de le faire
description.italian: Loralyn parlava con Pearce ogni volta che poteva
description.koreana: 로랄린은 기회가 있을 때마다 피어스와 대화했습니다
description.spanish: Loralyn habló con Pearce siempre que pudo.
description.russian: Лоралин использовала все шансы в разговоре с Пирсом
description.japanese: ロラリンはチャンスを逃さずピアースと会話した。
description.turkish: Loralyn, her fırsatta Pearce ile konuştu.
description.brazilian: Loralyn falou com Pearce durante todas as oportunidades que teve.
description.schinese: 洛莲一抓到机会就和皮尔斯通话

description.japanese: ジャクリーンが秘密を打ち明ける
description.schinese: 杰奎琳说出了她的秘密

description.english: The spirits have attacked everything Loralyn loves most
description.german: Die Geister haben alles ins Visier genommen, was dir am wichtigsten ist.
description.french: Les esprits ont attaqué tous ceux que Loralyn aime le plus
description.italian: Gli spiriti hanno colpito tutto ciò che Loralyn ama di più
description.koreana: 정령은 로랄린이 사랑하는 거의 전부를 공격했습니다
description.spanish: Los espíritus atacaron a todos los seres queridos de Loralyn.
description.russian: Духи напали на все, что Лоралин любит больше всего
description.japanese: 精霊たちはロラリンが愛してやまないものすべてに襲い掛かった
description.turkish: Ruhlar, Loralyn'in çok sevdiği her şeye saldırdı
description.brazilian: Os Espíritos atacaram tudo aquilo que Loralyn mais ama.
description.schinese: 洛莲所爱的每个人都遭到了攻击

description.german: Du hast Pearce den Geistern geopfert.
description.spanish: Loralyn sacrificó a Pearce a los espíritus.
description.japanese: ピアースを精霊たちに差し出す

description.english: Unable to obtain the book or scans from anyone
description.german: Es ist dir nicht gelungen, das Buch oder einen Scan des Buchs zu erhalten.
description.french: Vous n’avez pas pu obtenir le livre ou des scans du livre
description.italian: Incapace di ottenere il libro o le scansioni da nessuno
description.spanish: Loralyn no consiguió el libro en papel ni escaneado.
description.russian: Не удалось получить книгу или сканы
description.japanese: 本やスキャンを誰からも入手できない
description.turkish: Kimseden kitabı veya taranmış kopyasını alamadın
description.brazilian: Não foi possível obter nem o livro, nem digitalizações de ninguém.
description.schinese: 没能从任何人那里得到书
